mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, N.* from (select * from freeboard order by num desc) N) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: insert into freeboard values(notice_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, sysdate, notice_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update freeboard set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} where num = #{num}
